Keyboard shortcuts for Sketch

A visual cheat-sheet for the 149 keyboard shortcuts found in Sketch. This application is MacOS-only.

Original Reference Report Issue

General

  • C

Launch Sketch with all plugins disabled (hold on startup)

  • Shift

  • Ctrl
  • D

  • Opt

Refresh Data

  • Cmd
  • Shift
  • D

  • Cmd
  • Ctrl
  • R

With a gradient stop selected, position it between 0% and 100%

  • 0-9

Position selected gradient stop directly between two existing stops
